dev.description: Starts the development server using Vite with Hot Module Replacement (HMR).

build.description: Creates an optimized production build of the application in the 'dist' directory using Vite.

lint.description: Lints JavaScript and JSX files using ESLint to enforce code quality and find errors.

preview.description: Starts a local server to serve and preview the production build from the 'dist' directory.

test.description: Runs the unit tests defined in the project using the Vitest test runner.

format.description: Formats all supported files in the project using Prettier, overwriting them with the formatted version.
